Module ims.c482
Package ims.c482.controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
ims.c482.controllers.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
The MainController is used for supplying logic to the MainForm view.

    • MainController

      public MainController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Main controller initialization that sets the product or part tables up with proper data for viewing. Gets inventory instance and sets to the inventory variable.

    • handleExitButtonClick

      public void handleExitButtonClick()
      Handler for exiting the application cleanly.

    • handlePartAdd

      public void handlePartAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handler for adding a part.
      Parameters:
      event - Passed for grabbing the stage in order to set the scene and view for the Add Part Form to show on window.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the Add Part Form has any issue loading.

    • handleProductAdd

      public void handleProductAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handler for adding product.
      Parameters:
      event - Passed for grabbing the stage from in order to set the view and scene for Add Product Form to show on window.
      Throws:
      IOException - If Add Product Form view has an issue loading.

    • handlePartModify

      public void handlePartModify(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handler for opening a part for modification. Passes the selected and highlighted part from the parts table to the Modify Part controller for modification.
      Parameters:
      event - Passed so the stage can be acquired for setting the view and scene for Modify Part Form.
      Throws:
      IOException - If Modify Part Form has issue loading.

    • handleProductModify

      public void handleProductModify(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handler for the Product Modification window. Passes the highlighted and selected product from the product table to the Modify Product controller.
      Parameters:
      event - For use in grabbing the stage so a new view and scene can be set.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is issue loading the Modify Product Form.

    • handlePartDelete

      public void handlePartDelete()
      Handler for deleting a part from the parts table. Makes sure a part is selected and that the user confirms they want to delete.

    • handlePartsSearch

      public void handlePartsSearch(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handler for parts search. Checks for any part names in the inventory parts list first. If none are found, and the entry is an integer, checks by ID. Sets the table to whatever, if any, it finds.
      Parameters:
      event - Passed to check if the enter key is pressed during the key event.

    • handleProductDelete

      public void handleProductDelete()
      Handler for Product Deletion. Checks if a product is selected and confirms if the user wants to delete the product. Also checks to see if any parts are currently associated with the product before allowing for deletion.

    • handleProductSearch

      public void handleProductSearch(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handler for Product Search. Checks for any characters in all products list in Inventory before checking by ID next. Updates the table if any are found.
      Parameters:
      event - Passed to check if the enter key was pressed during the key event that triggers this handler.
